name: openL2CAPChannelAsync(_:withPSM:withConfiguration:delegate:)
desc: Opens a new L2CAP channel to the target device. Returns immediately after starting the opening process.
declaration:
func openL2CAPChannelAsync(_ newChannel: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<IOBluetoothL2CAPChannel?>!, 
                   withPSM psm: BluetoothL2CAPPSM, 
         withConfiguration channelConfiguration: [AnyHashable : Any]!, 
                  delegate channelDelegate: Any!) -> IOReturn
